name: suggestively
content:

Add to word list
in a way that makes people think about sex: The comedian grinned suggestively at the audience. He winked suggestively. See
suggestive
More examplesFewer examplesHe moved his body suggestively as he danced.The council is in dispute with the suggestively named restaurant chain.She raised her eyebrows suggestively.
